channel.title: Mediagazer
channel.description: Top news and commentary for media professionals from all around the web

item.title: ガーディアン・メディア・グループのコンテンツを映画・テレビ化するため、ソニー・ピクチャーズエンタテインメントとファーストルック契約を締結（Mark Sweney/The Guardian）
item.description:
Mark Sweney / The Guardian:
The Guardian reaches a first-look deal with Sony Pictures Entertainment to develop the Guardian Media Group's content for adaptation to film and TV  —  Collaboration will give Sony Pictures Entertainment exclusive first-look rights to Guardian's global journalism

item.title: Digital TV Research：世界のビデオ・オン・デマンド契約数は2023年から2029年の間に3億2100万件増加し17億9000万件になる見込み、米国ベースの上位6サービスは26％増（Karlene Lukovitz/MediaPost）
item.description:
Karlene Lukovitz / MediaPost:
Digital TV Research: global video-on-demand subscriptions are expected to grow by 321M between 2023 and 2029 to 1.79B, with the six top US-based services up 26%  —  Global subscription video-on-demand/SVOD subscriptions will grow by 321 million between 2023 and 2029, to reach 1.79 billion …

item.title: 元NPRの司会者ジェレミー・ホブソンが毎週司会を務める公共ラジオ番組「The Middle」の様子。
item.description:
Corbin Bolies / The Daily Beast:
A look at The Middle, a weekly public radio show hosted by ex-NPR host Jeremy Hobson that airs on 400 stations and hopes to reach the political middle of the US  —  Public radio's listenership is decidedly liberal.  A new weekly radio show from a former NPR producer seeks to change that.

item.title: アブダビが支援するRedBird IMIのCEOで元CNN代表のジェフ・ザッカーは、RedBirdの資金調達計画でもテレグラフ紙の編集の独立性を維持すると主張（Christopher Williams/Telegraph）
item.description:
Christopher Williams / Telegraph:
Jeff Zucker, CEO of Abu Dhabi-backed RedBird IMI and ex-CNN head, insists he would preserve editorial independence of The Telegraph under RedBird's funding plan  —  CNN veteran insists editorial independence would be preserved under proposed new ownership  —  The leader of the Abu-Dhabi …

item.title: 調査結果中国は、共産党を支持し、海外の批判的なシナリオから中国を守るために、120人以上の外国人インフルエンサーのグループを育成している。
item.description:
James Kynge / Financial Times:
Research: China is cultivating a growing group of 120+ foreign influencers to support the Communist Party and defend China against critical overseas narratives  —  New report finds social media stars speaking up for Beijing against critical overseas narratives

item.title: Adalytics：GoogleはAdalyticsを攻撃するが、調査結果を見直す予定（Natasha Lomas/TechCrunch）
item.description:
Natasha Lomas / TechCrunch:
Adalytics: Google ads appear on many compromising sites that make up its Search Partners network; Google attacks Adalytics but plans to review its findings  —  Adtech report exposes brand safety and ad fraud risks lurking in the Google Search Partners network...

item.title: アップル、「Apple Music Replay」を発表、トップソングやアーティストなど2023年の履歴を見直せるが、「Spotify Wrapped」にはまだ及ばない（Sarah Perez/TechCrunch）
item.description:
Sarah Perez / TechCrunch:
Apple launches Apple Music Replay, letting users review their 2023 history like top songs and artists, but the feature is still no match for Spotify Wrapped  —  Apple's year-end review and answer to Spotify Wrapped, Apple Music Replay, has arrived, but it's still no match for Spotify's personalized look back at your year in music.

item.title: イーロン・マスクがピザゲート陰謀説を増幅させたことを受け、ワシントン・ポストの広報担当者によると、同社はXへの広告掲載を一時停止することを決定した（Drew Harwell/Washington Post）。
item.description:
Drew Harwell / Washington Post:
A Washington Post spokesperson says the company has decided to pause advertising on X, after Elon Musk's amplification of the Pizzagate conspiracy theory  —  The far-right theory motivated a gunman to fire multiple rounds inside the Comet Ping Pong pizzeria in Northwest Washington in 2016.

item.title: ボブ・アイガーCEOの復帰から1年後のディズニー・スタッフのタウンホールで、幹部たちはESPNの2025年のストリーミング開始をまだ計画しており、量より質を重視していると語った（Deadline）。
item.description:
Deadline:
In a Disney staff town hall a year after CEO Bob Iger's return, executives say they still plan a 2025 streaming launch for ESPN and stress quality over quantity  —  Bob Iger and top execs stressed a commitment to quality over quantity as the studio's film slate has had a bumpy ride …

item.title: SubstackとTelegramの検索により、Substackに多数の白人至上主義者、新連邦主義者、ナチスのニュースレターがあることが判明。
item.description:
Jonathan M. Katz / The Atlantic:
Substack and Telegram searches reveal scores of white supremacist, neo-Confederate, and Nazi newsletters on Substack; over 16 displayed overt Nazi symbols  —  The newsletter platform's lax content moderation creates an opening for white nationalists eager to get their message out.

item.title: メモ：WaPoのパティ・ストーンシファーCEOによれば、10月以来120人の従業員がバイアウトを行ったが、今後2週間以内にさらに120人がバイアウトを行わなければ、レイオフを開始するとのこと（Max Tani/@maxwelltani）
item.description:
Max Tani / @maxwelltani:
Memo: WaPo CEO Patty Stonesifer says 120 employees have taken buyouts since October, but if another 120 don't do so in the next two weeks, it will start layoffs  —  In a memo to staff, Washington Post CEO Patty Stonesifer says 120 employees have accepted buyout packages. If the paper doesn't find another 120 people who will accept buyouts in the next two weeks, it will implement layoffs. [image]

item.title: ロシア、WSJ記者エヴァン・ガーシュコビッチ氏の拘束を3度目となる1月30日まで延長（Robyn Dixon/Washington Post）
item.description:
Robyn Dixon / Washington Post:
Russia extends the detention of WSJ journalist Evan Gershkovich for a third time to January 30  —  RIGA, Latvia — A Moscow court on Tuesday extended the detention of the Wall Street Journal journalist Evan Gershkovich until at least Jan. 30, prolonging his imprisonment since March on charges of spying …

item.title: ソースルパート・マードックは、フォックス社に対するスマートマティック社の名誉毀損訴訟の一環として、11月28日と29日に証人尋問を受ける予定である（ロイター）。
item.description:
Reuters:
Source: Rupert Murdoch is set to be deposed on November 28 and November 29 as part of the Smartmatic defamation lawsuit against Fox Corp  —  Rupert Murdoch is set to be questioned under oath on Tuesday and Wednesday as part of voting technology company Smartmatic's $2.7 billion defamation lawsuit …

item.title: アレックス・クーパーとマット・カプランが経営するメディア「Trending」が、元Metaの開発・番組制作責任者ミナ・ルフェーヴルをTV部門のチーフ・コンテンツ・オフィサーとして採用（BreAnna Bell/Variety）
item.description:
BreAnna Bell / Variety:
Alex Cooper and Matt Kaplan's Trending media company hires Mina Lefevre, ex-Meta's head of development and programming, as its chief content officer of TV  —  Lefevre will report to Kaplan and oversee creative, and strategic oversight for the company (ACE Entertainment, The Unwell Network and Call Her Daddy) in scripted and unscripted.

item.title: トロントを拠点とするベンチャーファンドのグッド・フューチャーが、カナダのテック業界紙ベータキットの株式の過半数を買収する計画（Temur Durrani/Globe and Mail）
item.description:
Temur Durrani / Globe and Mail:
Toronto-based venture fund Good Future plans to buy a majority stake in Canadian tech industry publication BetaKit  —  ////Two former leaders from Shopify Inc. are set to become the majority shareholders of tech-industry publication BetaKit and establish a new advisory board to maintain …
